FuncDef:
The service-policy cache update interval command configures an interval at which the downloaded EDSG service policy template is updated.
The undo service-policy cache update interval command disables the downloaded EDSG service policy template from being updated periodically.
By default, the downloaded EDSG service policy template is not updated periodically.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interval at which the downloaded EDSG service policy template is updated.
The value is an integer ranging from 5 to 65535.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A BRAS can download EDSG service policy template from a server and saves the template locally. To configure an interval at which the downloaded EDSG service policy template is updated, run the service-policy cache update interval command. Each time after the update timer expires, the template is updated.
Configuration Impact
If the service-policy cache update interval command is run more than once, the latest configuration overrides the previous one.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
